subject: RE: [junit] JUnit--Tomcat--JDBC DataSource--JNDI
msgSnippet: Hi, I think you should use HttpUnit for this kind of testing. There is api available for it. You can create webconversation object first and they submit the
messageBody:
Hi,

I think you should use HttpUnit for this kind of testing. There is api
available for it. You can create webconversation object first and they
submit the httprequest thru it. I hope this will work fine for you.

Thanks,
Devendra.



"Manuel Amago"
<mamago@bigfoo To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
t.com> cc:
